医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
疫情期间美国女性被迫性交的比例仍然很高密歇根大学的一项研究表明，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，成年早期强迫性交的比率有所上升，导致意外怀孕和许多其他性、生殖和心理健康问题的潜在增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Rates-of-forced-intercourse-among-US-women-remained-high-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Rates-of-forced-intercourse-among-US-women-remained-high-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e28237a1-a97d-489b-a1e8-289ddc15af4e Fri, 25 Aug 2023 22:05:24 -0400 Rates of forced intercourse among U.S. women remained high during the pandemic
疫苗-药物组合可减少危及生命的疟疾病例和儿童死亡一项具有里程碑意义的研究表明，在雨季之前给幼儿注射世界上第一种疟疾疫苗 RTS,S/AS01E 和抗疟药物，已经导致危及生命的疟疾病例和死亡人数在五年多的时间里显着减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Vaccine-Drug-Combination-Reduces-Life-Threatening-malaria-Cases-and-Deaths-in-Children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Vaccine-Drug-Combination-Reduces-Life-Threatening-malaria-Cases-and-Deaths-in-Children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05ffd7bf-380a-4b18-b6d9-8da34acc2f58 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 21:57:00 -0400 Vaccine-drug combination reduces life-threatening malaria cases and deaths in children
德雷塞尔大学获得资助支持细胞和基因治疗教育德雷塞尔大学生物医学工程、科学与健康系统学院与德雷塞尔医学院合作，获得了百时美施贵宝制药公司的资助，以支持对希望在细胞和基因领域从事职业的多元化和有才华的学生的教育和培训治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Drexel-University-receives-grants-to-support-cell-and-gene-therapy-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Drexel-University-receives-grants-to-support-cell-and-gene-therapy-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a5f8ab7-0b26-4d65-b0ea-b108d2f22afa Fri, 25 Aug 2023 21:50:05 -0400 Drexel University receives grants to support cell and gene therapy education
大流行期间有凝聚力的家庭心态与改善福祉有关尽管有报道称家庭在 COVID-19 大流行的艰难和限制下​​解体，但一项新的研究表明，许多家庭可能反而形成了更牢固的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Cohesive-family-mindset-linked-to-improved-well-being-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Cohesive-family-mindset-linked-to-improved-well-being-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf2b6b9a-335b-425c-9f48-a0c64c787513 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 21:44:56 -0400 Cohesive family mindset linked to improved well-being during the pandemic
医院预防导管相关尿路感染的新建议根据五个医学协会制定并于今天发表在《感染控制》杂志上的新建议，避免不必要地使用留置导尿管并及时拔除不再需要的导尿管是急性护理医院预防导尿管相关尿路感染的第一步和医院流行病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-recommendations-to-prevent-catheter-linked-urinary-tract-infections-in-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-recommendations-to-prevent-catheter-linked-urinary-tract-infections-in-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d07c0ca5-1c7e-464f-9268-1ea331ede389 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 21:37:20 -0400 New recommendations to prevent catheter-associated urinary tract infections in hospitals
预先登记招募可以提高研究参与度加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究人员发现，通过将研究招募嵌入到预先预约的 preCheck-in 页面中，他们可以以电子方式招募患者进行生物医学研究，其速度比传统的患者门户消息方法高出 40 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/PreCheck-in-recruitment-may-enhance-research-study-participation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/PreCheck-in-recruitment-may-enhance-research-study-participation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd002e47-65b7-41b9-99ba-8de0d2b5354b Fri, 25 Aug 2023 21:26:55 -0400 PreCheck-in recruitment may enhance research study participation
就业第一：促进残疾人有竞争力的就业安置自 COVID-19 大流行开始以来，全国支持就业优先协会 (APSE) 全国会议首次举行面对面会议，以促进曾经被认为“很难安置”的残疾人的竞争性就业安置，以及支持这项重要工作的专业。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Employment-First-Advancing-competitive-job-placement-for-people-with-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Employment-First-Advancing-competitive-job-placement-for-people-with-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c988b3dc-1de4-4173-aa5d-9ad37a817f81 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 21:21:45 -0400 Employment First: Advancing competitive job placement for people with disabilities
用于早期癌症检测的新型微流控细胞分离技术早期发现可以在许多疾病发展到严重阶段之前对其进行及时干预，而且通常治疗成本较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Novel-microfluidic-cell-separation-technology-for-early-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Novel-microfluidic-cell-separation-technology-for-early-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=120fc1b2-2b0a-44a9-a2bd-2273fccb466d Fri, 25 Aug 2023 21:16:56 -0400 Novel microfluidic cell separation technology for early cancer detection
皮下锚固件在固定导管方面比粘合剂更有效迄今为止，针对使用皮下锚固固定系统 (SASS) 的经外周插入中心导管 (PICC) 患者进行的最大规模研究表明，使用皮下锚固固定导管比使用粘合固定装置 (ASD) 更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Sub皮-anchors-more- effective-than-adhesives-in-securing-catheters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Sub皮-anchors-more- effective-than-adhesives-in-securing-catheters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3add4124-a265-4638-addb-2bc80a57f781 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 21:06:01 -0400 Subcutaneous anchors more effective than adhesives in securing catheters
舞蹈帮助帕金森病患者协商他们的身份东芬兰大学和斯德哥尔摩 Balettakademien 最近的一项研究发现，在舞蹈团表演并参与其活动在帕金森病患者的身份和与疾病相关的身份协商中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Dance-helps-people-with-Parkinsons-disease-negotiate-their-identity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Dance-helps-people-with-Parkinsons-disease-negotiate-their-identity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=413fcba2-dc48-4ffc-8e3b-6926273169bd Fri, 25 Aug 2023 15:32:20 -0400 Dance helps people with Parkinson's disease negotiate their identity
